"The present site of the San Prancisco Municipal Airport
includes a small portion of Site No.
4 (adjoining
• and the
south of Mills Field) and, should 1t become advisable to extend
the boundaries of the present airport in a north-south direction,
the survey shows that the extension should be to the southward.
Meteorological conditions over Site No.2 (South San Francisco)
preclude extension in that direction as they indicate more fog,
lower ceilings, poorer visibility, higher wind velocities and
more turbulence
are round over the present site of the
airport and the area immediately south thereof."
